triples.name: Artificial life
triples.relevance: The paper discusses the future emergence of artificial organisms and their properties, building on the field of artificial life research.

triples.name: Reproduction
triples.relevance: The paper emphasizes that artificial organisms will be capable of reproduction, a fundamental characteristic of life.

triples.name: Evolution
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how artificial organisms will evolve into forms different from their initial design, and the pace of evolutionary change.

triples.name: Lamarckism
triples.relevance: The paper explicitly mentions artificial organisms will have a Lamarckian component in their evolution due to conscious control over reproduction.

triples.name: Industrial Revolution
triples.relevance: Used as a historical comparison point for the magnitude of impact that artificial life emergence could have on humanity.

triples.name: Nuclear weapon
triples.relevance: Referenced as a technological advancement with significant historical impact, providing context for comparing artificial life's potential consequences.

triples.name: Pollution
triples.relevance: Environmental pollution is mentioned as a comparable historical problem to illustrate the scale of potential impacts from artificial life.
